AndoainMod:AmmoLock.NAME: Ammunition Lock
DESCRIPTIONS: Can no longer gain ammunition.

AndoainMod:NoAmmoGain.NAME: Ammunition Block
DESCRIPTIONS: Cannot gain ammunition this turn.

At the start of turn, remove Block from all enemies and apply 1 #ySlow to all enemies, shuffle 1 #yBurn+ into discard pile
